original: Ekman, Sven Elof, civilingenjör, Kalmar, f. 29/7/03 i Gökhem, Skarab. 1., av egendomsmäkl. Oscar Emanuel E. o. Elin Johansson. G. 36 m. Margareta Segersten. Barn: Per Olov f. 37, Gudrun 39, Gunnar o. Siteni 46. — Stud:ex. 22, KTH (K) 30. Tekn. ledare v. Kvarn A-B J. G. S. i Norr-köp. 30-46. Driftsing. v. Kalmar Äng-qvarns K. B. sed. 46. Medl. av Nord. cerealkemistfören. 32. Medl. av Kalm. Tekn. kl. s^ed. 46. Studieresor t. Tyskl. 31, Norge 32 o. 37, Danm. 39. Hobbies : fiske o. my ko logi.
translated: Ekman, Sven Elof, Engineer, Kalmar, b. 29/7/03 in Gökhem, Skaraborg, 1st child of real estate agent Oscar Emanuel E. and Elin Johansson. Married in 1936 to Margareta Segersten. Children: Per Olov b. 1937, Gudrun b. 1939, Gunnar and Siteni b. 1946. Completed secondary school in 1922, and graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1930. Technical leader at Kvarn A-B J.G.S. in Norrköping from 1930-1946, and operating engineer at Kalmar Ängqvarns K.B. thereafter. Member of Nordic Cereal Chemist Association since 1932 and member of Kalmar Technical Society since 1946. Went on study trips to Germany in 1931, Norway in 1932 and 1937, and Denmark in 1939. Hobbies: fishing and entomology.

structured.name: Sven Elof Ekman
structured.description: Swedish engineer known for his work at Kvarn A-B J.G.S. and Kalmar Ängqvarns K.B. as well as his membership in the Nordic Cereal Chemist Association and Kalmar Technical Society. Ekman was born on July 29, 1903 in Gökhem, Skaraborg and completed his studies at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1930. In 1936, he married Margareta Segersten and had four children: Per Olov, Gudrun, Gunnar, and Siteni. Ekman passed away on December 31, 1992.
